name: subdomainfinder
title: Subdomain Finder
description: Searches for subdomains of a given domain using an external tool (subfinder). The domain is provided as a query parameter.

error_response_500.detail: Pesan error dari alat subfinder atau informasi lebih lanjut.

notes: This API relies on the 'subfinder' tool being installed and accessible in the server's PATH. Results may vary based on the tool's data sources and the domain's configuration.
